pages.title: Web Development
pages.shortDescription: With a bachelors degree in Computer Science and proven work experience, I have a passion for leveraging state-of-the-art frameworks and technologies to design, develop and deploy creative and engaging web experiences.

pages.title: Videography
pages.description: My creativity and passion for directing, producing, and editing professional videos and documentaries have allowed me to craft captivating stories that resonate deeply. Whether it's capturing the beauty and emotion of a wedding day, creating impactful documentaries, event recaps, or music productions, my goal is to deliver timeless visuals that inspire, connect, and leave a lasting impact on the lives of others.
pages.shortDescription: My creativity and passion for directing, producing and editing professional videos and documentaries have allowed me to create beautiful and engaging projects that have a lasting impact on the lives of others.
